0000100101111001 1001100110111111 1 -> sum: 1010001100111001, cout: 0
1011010001110000 0100010011000100 1 -> sum: 1111100100110101, cout: 0
0001111100000000 1000101101001110 1 -> sum: 1010101001001111, cout: 0
0110101011101000 1110001010111000 0 -> sum: 0100110110100000, cout: 1
0011100110001100 1010010010101101 0 -> sum: 1101111000111001, cout: 0
0010010101011011 0100001111100000 0 -> sum: 0110100100111011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
